ShortDescription.Value: Increases number of workers and other small adjustments for City Services.

Publish.LongDescription:
**City Services Redux** aka RealCity
Tweak and modify City Service buildings to your liking. By default, you could just install this mod and use it as-is with no configuration.
### Quick-Start - Just select "PRESETS" and play, done. - Curated preset list increases the number of workers and a few other small adjustments (details below). - Increased workers automatically increases the wages (scaled by the game itself). - New settings are only applied to **new** buildings.
Number of **preset** buildings and extensions: **221**.
### 7 Languages * English, Français French, Deutsch German, Español Spanish * 简体中文 Simplified Chinese, Português Brazilian, Polski Polish
### Curated Presets * All buildings have more workplaces, some have required education levels adjusted, and other allowed tweaks. * Presets are designed with various considerations. Some have only slightly more workers (2), and some have many. * Examples: University is 170 workers, preset increases this to 400 as this large building campus. * Crematorium has 2x higher processing rate to handle increased deaths from Population Rebalance. * Existing buildings need to be destroyed and plopped again to see new changes. * If you want more than preset numbers, then see Power users.
### Power Users - Easily tweak all player adjustable config file as you wish. - Open mod Options > Custom > [Open Config folder] to create a Config.xml file you can customize. - Refer to info / examples in Config.xml for how to add / alter components (edit with Notepad++ or similar). - New changes can be "Applied" even during the game (use options menu).
### Notes
* DLC entries only work if you own the DLC and can plop the items. * Safety: mod does **not** modify save files or any game systems. * Can be removed at any time - already plopped buildings retain modded values and new buildings will have vanilla values. * Performance: this is a lightweight configuration mod. It only does a short pass when applying settings (on game load or when you click APPLY). It does not add any per-frame systems, so it essentially has no impact on performance. * Works with mods: Adjust School, Adjust Transit, Magic Mail, Magic Garbage Truck, as this mod is focused on the number of workers and those do not. * Magic Hearse and Achievement Fixer also works with this. Pretty much any mod that doesn't adjust worker numbers should be good.
